title: VCMI terrain format
description: Format used to define new terrains in VCMI

shortIdentifier.description: Two-letters unique indentifier for this terrain. Used for map format

type.description: Type of this terrain. Can be land, water, subterranean or rock

moveCost.description: How many movement points needed to move hero

rockTerrain.description: The name of rock type terrain which will be used as borders in the underground

river.description: River type which should be used for that terrain

paletteAnimation.description: If defined, terrain will be animated using palette color cycling effect

battleFields.description: List of battleFields that can be used on this terrain

minimapUnblocked.description: Color of terrain on minimap without unpassable objects. RGB triplet, 0-255 range

minimapBlocked.description: Color of terrain on minimap with unpassable objects. RGB triplet, 0-255 range

music.description: Music filename to play on this terrain on adventure map

sounds.description: List of sounds for this terrain

ambient.description: List of ambient sounds for this terrain

horseSound.description: Hero movement sound for this terrain, version for moving on tiles with road

horseSoundPenalty.description: Hero movement sound for this terrain, version for moving on tiles without road

prohibitTransitions.description: List or terrain names, which is prohibited to make transition from/to

transitionRequired.description: If sand/dirt transition required from/to other terrains

terrainViewPatterns.description: Represents layout of tile orientations in terrain tiles file
